title: Domme by Default
description: Kinky never looked so normal.When a wife is faced with the question of what she is wiling to do for love, her answer is...anything. She sets aside her own inhibitions to fulfill her husband's wildest fantasies.But at what cost to her peace of mind? erotic m/f BDSM sex and activities including anal play/sex/toys, a home-improvement challenged husband, a sarcastic wife, and a portrayal of the kinder, gentler side of BDSM.
author: Tymber Dalton
